title: Chapter 1122 - A Thread Of A Chance
body:
Chapter 1122 - A Thread Of A Chance

Su Yi tapped the beast skin scroll.

The landscape depicted on its surface instantly came to life, undergoing a wondrous transformation. The rivers and mountain ranges wriggled like worms, gradually outlining an all-new image.

Meanwhile, characters the size of a fly’s head arose throughout different sections of the landscape, like the markings of a geomantic map.

The labels were simple. They said either “survivable,” “dangerous,” “perilous,” or “certain death.”

When he took another look at the geography depicted on the scroll, Su Yi’s heart shook. That was the shape of the Graveyard of Fallen Immortals’ outer perimeter!

He’d visited three times in his past life. How could he not recognize it?

Most wondrous of all was that the geography was clearly labeled based on its danger level. One of the places marked was a massive ravine spanning a wasteland.

Su Yi remembered it clearly. He’d visited that very wasteland his first time entering the Graveyard of Fallen Immortals. In the end, he encountered a group of terrifying lifeforms like demonic gods and departed spirits. They could have killed an Imperial Apex cultivator with ease.

Su Yi escaped with his life, but only just...
